ns2:test-suite.name: Notifications Repo status reportFinishedFlow positive tests
ns2:test-suite.title: Notifications Repo status reportFinishedFlow positive tests

test-case.name: should not report status in case trigger is not BUILD or WEBHOOK
test-case.title: should not report status in case trigger is not BUILD or WEBHOOK

test-case.name: should report with state success in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is success
test-case.title: should report with state success in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is success

test-case.name: should report with state failure in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is error
test-case.title: should report with state failure in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is error

test-case.name: should report with state error in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is terminated
test-case.title: should report with state error in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is terminated

test-case.name: should report with state error in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is terminating
test-case.title: should report with state error in case the flow was triggered by webhook and status is terminating

test-case.name: should return public URL if pipeline is public
test-case.title: should return public URL if pipeline is public
